desc: Okanagan Soap located in Kelowna BC Canada. Okanagan Soap proudly handcrafts luxurious, all natural, vegan friendly bath and body products. Okanagan Soap offers bulk order discounts, wholesale, private label, custom orders, Airbnb bath products, Salon/Spa products and event favors.

layout.text: Luxurious, all natural, vegan friendly soaps infused with pure essential oils.
